entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
